fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e2.equipments.heater.mil.events

Class SetPowerHeater

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.Event
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.es.events.ES_Event
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e2.equipments.heater.mil.events.SetPowerHeater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HeaterEventI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.es.events.ES_EventI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventI, java.io.Serializable

    public class SetPowerHeater
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.es.events.ES_Event
implements HeaterEventI
    The class SetPowerHeater defines the simulation event of the heater power being set to some level (in watts).

    Description

    Glass-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Black-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-10-12

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static class  SetPowerHeater.PowerValue
      The class PowerValue represent a power value to be passed as an EventInformationI when creating a SetPowerHeater event.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SetPowerHeater

        public SetPowerHeater(fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.time.Time timeOfOccurrence,
                      fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventInformationI content)
        create a SetPowerHeater event which content is a PowerValue.

        Contract

         pre     timeOfOccurrence != null
 pre     content != null && content instanceof PowerValue
 post    getTimeOfOccurrence().equals(timeOfOccurrence)
 post    content == null || getEventInformation().equals(content)
        Parameters:
        timeOfOccurrence - time at which the event must be executed in simulated time.
        content - the power value to be set on the heater when the event will be executed.
